api/index.html.title: RUIAN | RUIAN
api/index.html.keywords: RUIAN Simple RUIAN API .NET library. This project is by no means a complete implementation. It originated as a part of a larger project I decided to open source. The original ArcGIS RUIAN REST API is available here . This site serves only as documentation—more information about the project is available on GitHub .

api/RUIAN.html.title: Namespace RUIAN | RUIAN
api/RUIAN.html.keywords: Namespace RUIAN Classes RUIANInterface Static class for querying RUIAN REST API.

api/RUIAN.QueryBuidlers.html.title: Namespace RUIAN.QueryBuidlers | RUIAN
api/RUIAN.QueryBuidlers.html.keywords: Namespace RUIAN.QueryBuidlers Classes SimpleRUIANQueryBuider Creates query selecting items that have region number within the set of region numbers and the parcel number within the set of parcel numbers. No restriction is applied if the set is left empty. It is not thread-safe. Interfaces IRUIANQueryBuilder<T> An interface for classes used for creating RUIAN queries.

index.html.title: RUIAN | RUIAN
index.html.keywords: RUIAN Simple RUIAN API .NET library. This project is by no means a complete implementation. It originated as a part of a larger project I decided to open source. The original ArcGIS RUIAN REST API is available here . This site serves only as documentation—more information about the project is available on GitHub .
